item.description:
To keep up our momentum, we are meeting again next Wednesday. Please come with your stories of both success and woe, and a short description of what you did and didn't do this week with respect to procrastination or clutter. It seems to reduce the stress of life with procrastination and/or clutter to know you are not alone, and to be able to be of help to others as well as getting help and empathetic ears.

If there is enough interest, we'll consider having regular weekly meetings. So much easier to put on a calendar than the occasional monthly meeting.

Hope to see you on the 25th.

-Alice
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a sign saying Metrowest P & C - will try to grab space in the front on the right as you enter
item.name: Let's meet again next Wednesday, the 25th
